sentences.english: Comparisons with our previous studies on the Yami children were included in the present report.
sentences.chinese: 本報告中亦包括與蘭嶼學童調查結果之比較。

sentences.english: The school dropout rate also is high.
School children play inside a charity school in Leh, capital of Ladakh September 24, 2007 .
sentences.chinese: 學童在拉達克首府列的一間慈善學校內玩遊戲。

sentences.english: As school-boys, finding mistake too late.
sentences.chinese: 象學童終於發現題目已做錯。

sentences.english: During the same period, a Jordanian soldier had gone berserk and killed seven Israeli schoolchildren.
sentences.chinese: 其間，一名約旦士兵瘋狂殺死了七名以色列學童。

sentences.english: School children walk past fishing boats in Maputo, June 27, 2007.
sentences.chinese: 學童走過佈滿漁船的馬布多海邊。

sentences.english: The reading discussion method was not significantly improved the fourth grade students' reading attitude.
sentences.chinese: 閱讀討論教學無法提升國小四年級學童的閱讀態度。

sentences.english: There were no significant differences between boys and girls in their attitudes toward learning English with picture-book instruction.
sentences.chinese: 不同性別學童對英語繪本教學之學習態度無顯著差異。

sentences.english: As any schoolchild can tell you, the planet is blue.
sentences.chinese: 任何一個學童都能告訴你，地球是藍色的。

sentences.english: School-children are taught according to age groups.
sentences.chinese: 學童是按年齡分組施教的。

sentences.english: Vouchers will help a large number of our young children get a better pre-school education.
sentences.chinese: 學券制將爲我們大部分的學童帶來更優質的學前教育。

sentences.english: Sixth grade students showed higher idol glorification tendency.
sentences.chinese: 國小六年級學童有較高的偶像崇拜傾向。

sentences.english: Global Handwashing Day campaign aims to engage schoolchildren as effective agents for change.
sentences.chinese: 全球洗手日活動的目的是爲變革進行有效的代理學童。

sentences.english: Meng -Ay Church is lack of volunteers to help students to do their homework.
sentences.chinese: 蒙愛教會於下午時段需要志工協助教會學童課後輔導。

sentences.english: Two, strengthen school-children's management to time to experience leisure effectively.
sentences.chinese: 加強學童對時間的管理，以有效利用時間體驗休閒。

sentences.english: Which American schoolchild hasn't heard of Space Camp?
sentences.chinese: 哪一個美國學童沒聽過太空營？

definition: head of a household/family head/patriarch/parent or guardian of a child
